title: Select
description: The Select component is a customizable dropdown for single and multiple selections, featuring search, controlled/uncontrolled modes, and flexible UI customization.

body.raw:
# Select Component The `Select` component provides an intuitive dropdown menu that supports both single and multiple selections with an optional search input. ## Preview and Code Snippet Preview Code {(() => { const { useState } = React; const options = [ "apple", "banana", "blueberry", "grapes", "pineapple", "mango", "strawberry", "orange", "kiwi", "watermelon", "peach", "pear" ]; const [selectedFruits, setSelectedFruits] = useState(''); const [selectedFruit, setSelectedFruit] = useState(''); return (
); })()} ```tsx import { useState } from 'react'; import { Select, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem, } from '@/components/select'; export const SelectSingle = () => { const [selectedFruits, setSelectedFruit] = useState('apple'); const handleSelect = (value: string | string[]) => { setSelectedFruit(value as string); }; return ( ); }; ``` ## Props ### ` console.log(value)}> Apple Banana ```
